name: askvault-obsidian
description: A chat interface plugin for Obsidian

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && node copy-files.mjs
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.prepare: echo Use 'yarn install' or fix npm by switching to Node.js v22
